I was impressed today with LAPS Deans at a workshop on new alt.stream conversion. I was originally opposed to alt steam not anymore #YorkU
You voted & change happened. Dont stop now! Today is the perfect day to help make Canada better. Pick an issue & an NGO: get involved today!
@JustinTrudeau Mr Prime Minister I also ask you to lower the voting age. Both these requests are old/defeated Liberal Private member bills
Dear @JustinTrudeau congratulations. Now Mr Prime Minister please do the right thing & have a Minister of Children & Youth in your Cabinet
Im skeptical of all majority government but hopeful tonight our new PM will return Canada to the forefront of global social justice issues
Regardless of who you vote for, I want you to vote. It's our freedom to have differences & voice them publicly that makes Canada great!

Today is the day to celebrate freedom. Now get out there Canada and VOTE! 
#Democracy works because we do! Every vote matters.
